WorkItem.Description:
This line in the DslDefinition.dsl file 
 
<Designer FileExtension="csd" Icon="D:\Personal\FolderShare\Projects\CodePlex\csd\Main\Source\Dsl\Resources\ConfigurationSectionDesigner.ico" EditorGuid="548a5f67-a0b1-4c78-84f0-508456f45157">
 
should maybe be changed to 
 
<Designer FileExtension="csd" Icon="Resources\ConfigurationSectionDesigner.ico" EditorGuid="548a5f67-a0b1-4c78-84f0-508456f45157">
 
Scott
WorkItem.Summary: DslDefinition.dsl has a hardcoded path to the ConfigurationSectionDesigner.ico file

Comments.Message: I'm aware of that, but unfortunately I think it's a bug in the tools: the DSL designer doesn't let me choose a relative path for that icon (it seems to resolve the relative path against the Visual Studio directory). I'll check it out and see if there's a workaround but otherwise you should indeed take care to change the path locally...
If it makes any difference, I was able to change it in the xml file and it keeps the change there.
I'm sorry it took a little while but it's finally done.
